mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, INNERTABLE.* FROM (SELECT COMPANY_ID, EMAIL, COMPANY_NAME, TEL FROM COMPANY ORDER BY COMPANY_ID DESC) INNERTABLE WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{page} + 1) * 10) WHERE RN > #{page} * 10
